sourcesContent:
<template>
  <ion-page>
    <ion-header :translucent="true">
      <ion-toolbar>
        <IonButtons>
          <ion-back-button :text="messages[idioma]['backText']" />
        </IonButtons>
        <ion-title>{{ messages[idioma]["registerTitle"] }}</ion-title>
      </ion-toolbar>
    </ion-header>

    <ion-content :fullscreen="true" class="ion-padding">
      <ion-list lines="full" class="ion-no-margin">
        <ion-list-header lines="full">
          <ion-label> Personal </ion-label>
        </ion-list-header>

        <ion-item>
          <ion-label position="floating">{{
            messages[idioma]["nameTitle"]
          }}</ion-label>
          <ion-input type="text"></ion-input>
        </ion-item>

        <ion-item>
          <ion-label position="floating">{{
            messages[idioma]["surnameTitle"]
          }}</ion-label>
          <ion-input type="text"></ion-input>
        </ion-item>
      </ion-list>
      
      <ion-list lines="full" class="ion-no-margin">
        <ion-list-header lines="full">
          <ion-label> General </ion-label>
        </ion-list-header>

        <ion-item>
          <ion-label position="floating">{{
            messages[idioma]["mailTitle"]
          }}</ion-label>
          <ion-input type="email"></ion-input>
        </ion-item>

        <ion-item>
          <ion-label position="floating">{{
            messages[idioma]["passwordTitle"]
          }}</ion-label>
          <ion-input type="password"></ion-input>
        </ion-item>

        <ion-item>
          <ion-label position="floating">{{
            messages[idioma]["confirmPasswordTitle"]
          }}</ion-label>
          <ion-input type="password"></ion-input>
        </ion-item>
      </ion-list>

      <ion-button id="registerButton" expand="block" @click="startRegister">
        {{ messages[idioma]["registerTitle"] }}
      </ion-button>
    </ion-content>
  </ion-page>
</template>

<script>
import {
  IonContent,
  IonHeader,
  IonPage,
  IonTitle,
  IonToolbar,
  IonButtons,
  IonButton,
  IonBackButton,
  IonList,
  IonListHeader,
  IonLabel,
  IonItem,
  IonInput,
} from "@ionic/vue";
import { defineComponent } from "vue";
import { NativeStorage } from "@ionic-native/native-storage";

export default defineComponent({
  name: "RegisterPage",
  components: {
    IonContent,
    IonHeader,
    IonPage,
    IonTitle,
    IonToolbar,
    IonButtons,
    IonBackButton,
    IonButton,
    IonList,
    IonListHeader,
    IonLabel,
    IonItem,
    IonInput,
  },
  data: function () {
    return {
      messages: {
        es: require("../../public/assets/i18n/es.json"),
        ca: require("../../public/assets/i18n/ca.json"),
        en: require("../../public/assets/i18n/en.json"),
      },
      idioma: "es",
    };
  },
  mounted: function () {
    NativeStorage.getItem("idioma").then((x) => (this.idioma = x));
  },
  methods: {
    startRegister: function () {
      alert("[TODO] Registro realizado con Ã©xito");
    },
  },
});
</script>

<style>
@import "../styles/homeStyle.css";
</style>
